name: synthigme-web
description: Prototype EMS Synthi interface in WebAudio

scripts.release:patch: node scripts/release/pre.mjs && npm version patch --message "release: Synthi GME v%s" && node scripts/release/post.mjs
scripts.release:minor: node scripts/release/pre.mjs && npm version minor --message "release: Synthi GME v%s" && node scripts/release/post.mjs
scripts.release:major: node scripts/release/pre.mjs && npm version major --message "release: Synthi GME v%s" && node scripts/release/post.mjs
scripts.postversion:
printf '
Recuerda ejecutar git push origin main && git push origin --tags
'
